goal.ch:
「教師專業素養指引-師資職前教育階段」主要包含五項教師專業素養與17項的教師專業素養指標，其目的為提供師資培育大學依師資培育法所揭櫫培育教師具博雅及教育志業精神之共同課程，依其規劃教育專業與專門課程。本課程依據第三大項「規劃適切的課程、教學及多元評量」之3-4小項「應用多元教學策略、教學媒材與學習科技，以促進學生有效學習」規畫課程。再搭配中央大學師資培育中心師資生核心能力，教學創新(能夠適當運用科技於教學)、團隊合作(具備溝通協調能力)，進行妥善規畫與評量。
依照部定範圍規劃，包含以下議題，運算思維與人工智慧、資料表示與處理、演算法、程式設計以及STEAM無人機程式設計，並依當前教育趨勢及教育現場需求適時調整，讓學生能跟上教育現場的脈動。
goal.en:
The “Guidelines for Teacher Professional Competence - Pre-Service Teacher Education Stage“ primarily includes five areas of teacher professional competence and 17 indicators of teacher professional competence. Its purpose is to provide a framework for teacher training universities to design general education courses, following the Teacher Education Act, to cultivate teachers with a spirit of liberal arts and educational commitment. This course is designed based on the third major area, “Planning Appropriate Curriculum, Instruction, and Diverse Assessment,“ specifically the sub-item 3-4, “Applying diverse teaching strategies, instructional materials, and learning technologies to promote effective student learning.“

In conjunction with the core competencies of pre-service teachers at the National Central University’s Teacher Training Center, such as teaching innovation (the ability to appropriately use technology in teaching) and teamwork (communication and coordination skills), the course is carefully planned and evaluated.

According to the Ministry‘s guidelines, the course includes the following topics: computational thinking and artificial intelligence, data representation and processing, algorithms, programming, and STEAM drone programming. These topics are adjusted according to current educational trends and the needs of the educational field, ensuring that students stay in tune with the pulse of contemporary education.
